fields.text: My family loves this spot. Kid friendly and an easy walk from the parking area.
Oh forgot to say, there is a brilliant pub near the parking area. Make sure to stop in for a hot drink after your swim!
Here is a new comment for Katie.
This is such a great swimming hole with lot of places to jump in. Make sure to check for rocks under the water before you jump! And you won't have any issues finding parking at Hardknott Pass.
My partner and I probably visit this spot once a month. We absolutely love it.
There are a lot more people visiting this spot and they aren't very respectful of nature. Lots of rubbish around now. If you visit make sure to take your trash home!
